body.p:
Taylor County Ky
August the 9th 1865
To his Exalancy Thomas Bramlette Governor of Ky

I have Knowed M B Cox ever since his childhood and have never knowd or heard of any thing against his carector untill the charge of which he is now convicted he was a man Boy of rema^r^kable good morrels

very Respectfully Your obt servt
H. H, Fergusion
